title: Fragment of Velvet
medium: Silk, warp-float faced 3:1 twill weave with weft-float faced 1:3 twill interlacings of secondary binding warps and gilt-metal-strip-wrapped silk supplementary facing wefts; supplementary warps forming pile-on-pile cut velvet with supplementary brocading wefts forming weft loops in areas with voided velvet
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Gift of Martin A. Ryerson through the Antiquarian Society
